name: MailerLite Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when MailerLite events occur
natural_language_description: 这是 MailerLite Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when MailerLite events occur

event.name: event
event.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event | 作用: The events to listen to | 默认值: [] | (必填项)
available_options: Campaign Sent (值: campaign.sent) - Fired when campaign is sent
Subscriber Added Through Webform (值: subscriber.added_through_webform) - Fired when a subscriber is added though a form
Subscriber Added to Group (值: subscriber.add_to_group) - Fired when a subscriber is added to a group
Subscriber Automation Completed (值: subscriber.automation_complete) - Fired when subscriber finishes automation
Subscriber Automation Triggered (值: subscriber.automation_triggered) - Fired when subscriber starts automation
Subscriber Bounced (值: subscriber.bounced) - Fired when an email address bounces
Subscriber Complained (值: subscriber.complaint) - Fired when subscriber marks a campaign as a spam
Subscriber Created (值: subscriber.create) - Fired when a new subscriber is added to an account
Subscriber Removed From Group (值: subscriber.remove_from_group) - Fired when a subscriber is removed from a group
Subscriber Unsubscribe (值: subscriber.unsubscribe) - Fired when a subscriber becomes unsubscribed
Subscriber Updated (值: subscriber.update) - Fired when any of the subscriber's custom fields are updated
